titleInfo.title: Quartet for classical guitars. 4th movement, Jambalaya.

subject.topic: Festival of Texas Composers (1994 : Austin, Tex.)

mods.note: Quartet for Classical Guitars was comissioned by the San Antonio Guitar Quartet and premiered at the 1994 Festival of Texas Composers hosted by the University of Texas, Austin. This recording is the movement 'Jambalaya' performed on a Roland Synthesizer. Note: this contains a more accurate performance.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
Physical rights and copyright are retained by the LSU Libraries. Permission to reproduce or publish must be requested through the Special Collections Division, Louisiana State University Libraries.
mods.note: William J. Thornton Papers, Mss. 2012, Louisiana and Lower Mississippi Valley Collections, LSU Libraries, Baton Rouge, La.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
